plays.text: Penalty to Pavel Brendl 2 minutes for Hooking Alexei Smirnov
Goal scored by Adam Oates assisted by Sandis Ozolinsh

Goal scored by Paul Kariya assisted by Petr Sykora and Steve Rucchin

Goal scored by Sandis Ozolinsh assisted by Petr Sykora and Adam Oates
Penalty to Glen Wesley 2 minutes for Tripping Mike Leclerc
Penalty to Mike Leclerc 2 minutes for Tripping Glen Wesley
Penalty to Stanislav Chistov 2 minutes for Tripping Jan Hlavac
Goal scored by Jason Krog assisted by Stanislav Chistov and Mike Leclerc
Penalty to David Tanabe 2 minutes for Holding Petr Sykora
